main.name: Gaurav Dabhade
main.description: I am Software Developer from Pune. I love
bio: Namasteüôè, Myself Gaurav Dabhade from Pune! Lovely peoples also calls me `DB`.

I've had 4+ years of experience in software development with strong logical, programming and debugging skills. Mostly, I work on backend development with Python. I take responsibility for the design of the system and database, the development of features and enhancements, testing, and deployment. Good understanding / knowledge of web application architecture and ecosystem. Exposure on data modelling and data engineering. I am also enthusiastic about best practices, design patterns, and code refactoring. Demonstrated history of working in the software development/services/management. Skilled in Python, Django, React, Git, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, Docker, MySQL/Postgres, Linux, Agile Methodologies and Management.

Along with Software Development, I like reading books, cooking and visiting new places. I'm a quiet person and a good audience for poetry. I play chess and cricket. I also enjoy having dogs as pets. I am good listener and understanding person. I do criticise something negative and encourage something positive. I am B+ with every drop of my bloodü©∏.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.school: SKN Sinhgad Institute of Technology, Lonavala
education.degree: Batchelores of Engineering in Computer Science
education.description: It is one of the most beautiful campus in India. This discipline undergraduate programe, I studied computation of hardware, software and various programming languages and design that form an integral part of computer science. Some related Subjects as Operating Systems, Networking, Data Structure and Algorithms, Database Systems, Cloud Computing, Artificial Intelligence, Programming with C/C++/Java, Information Technology, Data Science, Computer Architecture, Micro-controllers/processers etc

Diploma in Computer Technology is a 3 year program that deals with computer hardware/software, networking, OS, Computer Engineering, Software Testing, Soft-skills etc. Since it is a diploma course the depth is kept at the beginner level.
